snippet: The announcement by the state comptroller was Israel’s latest effort to head off an International Criminal Court inquiry into its actions in the war last summer with Hamas.
abstract: Israel's state comptroller says investigation is underway into moves by military and political leaders during 50-day war with Hamas in Gaza in 2014; statement is country's latest attempt to stop International Criminal Court inquiry into its conduct.
lead_paragraph: The announcement by the state comptroller was Israel’s latest effort to head off an International Criminal Court inquiry into its actions in the war last summer with Hamas.

headline.main: Israeli Government Watchdog Investigates Military’s Conduct in Gaza War
headline.print_headline: Israeli Government Watchdog Investigates Military’s Conduct in Gaza War
